title: Attempting to reconnect to Chat
body:
Unable to stay connected to chat... it just loops like this over and over. I've never had a problem before and windows firewall is off. 

https://i.gyazo.com/df969471b0f0bb3fe30d47baaaaabec3.gif

replies.body:
You could be running any number of other incompatible network settings causing these chat disconnections. I strongly recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so we can ensure your local settings in good to go.

Please let me know if this caused any change.
